router
Class DatagramService

java.lang.Object
  router.RouterService
      router.DatagramService
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class DatagramService
extends RouterService

The DatagramService class provides datagram IO services.

Nested Class Summary
static class DatagramService.Datagram
          The Datagram class represents an array of bytes and the interface it was received on or is to be transmitted on.
